messages: 6fb9253e45b0c2b1cd926321bf8acd28 (19:36): hello, i need help with html marquee
6fb9253e45b0c2b1cd926321bf8acd28 (19:49): hello, i need help with html marquee

136126c730b6b812c7c4e0268d186e6a (19:53): guys, having problems with <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,initial-scale=1"> - doesn't seem to scale correctly on iPad in portrait (768px). any ideas please?
136126c730b6b812c7c4e0268d186e6a (19:54): iOS 5, if it's relevant...
136126c730b6b812c7c4e0268d186e6a (19:56): actually removing the initial-scale=1 fixes the problem. but why is in the html5boilerplate then?
2cdd7064b290132617248dbfd85f740e (19:56): 136126c730b6b812c7c4e0268d186e6a: it just means the zoom is set to 1
136126c730b6b812c7c4e0268d186e6a (19:57): 2cdd7064b290132617248dbfd85f740e: but why is it in the boilerplate, if it effectively breaks iPad layout?
136126c730b6b812c7c4e0268d186e6a (20:01): 2cdd7064b290132617248dbfd85f740e: don't have screenshot from iPad. it's just that the page won't scale down to iPad width when there's initial-scale=1
2cdd7064b290132617248dbfd85f740e (20:01): it is not supposed to scale down with initial scale 1
2cdd7064b290132617248dbfd85f740e (20:01): thats the meaning of initial scale 1
b9488a3381715cd652ca2b9dbdd622c6 (20:01): 136126c730b6b812c7c4e0268d186e6a: there is an open ticket about the viewport meta tag and removing initial-scale
136126c730b6b812c7c4e0268d186e6a (20:02): 2cdd7064b290132617248dbfd85f740e: understand. just curious why it's by default in the boilerplate.
2cdd7064b290132617248dbfd85f740e (20:02): ?g github h5bp html5boilerplate initial-scale 1

013b5bc70e5cf30b66561eac351d4c62 (20:02): 2cdd7064b290132617248dbfd85f740e, #824: Remove initial-scale=1.0 from meta viewport - Issues - h5bp ... - https://github.com/h5bp/html5-boilerplate/issues/824
0e5e37c845fffd6712293b5e7c041021 (20:02): ‚òÖ Issue #824 on html5-boilerplate, reported by alexgibson (2m, 2w ago): Remove initial-scale=1.0 from meta viewport
7871d6599fe93c2ed6ce7467e5f6878c (20:12): Probably not really the right chan, but I know that there are some really smart people in, like paul_irish and such.
7871d6599fe93c2ed6ce7467e5f6878c (20:13): I'm trying to create a proof of concept, that will transfer the entire dom from one web page to another.
7871d6599fe93c2ed6ce7467e5f6878c (20:13): Basically, just have two iFrames side by side, and take the current state of iframe1, and transfer it to iframe2
7871d6599fe93c2ed6ce7467e5f6878c (20:14): or, to put it to vague, but horrible code... iframe2.window = iframe1.window
6fb9253e45b0c2b1cd926321bf8acd28 (20:15): hello, i need help with html marquee,
7871d6599fe93c2ed6ce7467e5f6878c (20:15): which I'm sure has countless pitfalls
2cdd7064b290132617248dbfd85f740e (20:15): 6fb9253e45b0c2b1cd926321bf8acd28: why would you use it?
6fb9253e45b0c2b1cd926321bf8acd28 (20:15): http://joomlademos.co.uk/bar/index.html
6fb9253e45b0c2b1cd926321bf8acd28 (20:15): this images marquee
2cdd7064b290132617248dbfd85f740e (20:15): 7871d6599fe93c2ed6ce7467e5f6878c: you basically need a dom parser
6fb9253e45b0c2b1cd926321bf8acd28 (20:15): at the bottom
0de37da1d654c10aed33d7b7347b8e3b (20:15): iaincarsberg, at the very least surely you mean iframe1.document = iframe2.document
2cdd7064b290132617248dbfd85f740e (20:16): 7871d6599fe93c2ed6ce7467e5f6878c: https://github.com/tmpvar/jsdom ?
7871d6599fe93c2ed6ce7467e5f6878c (20:16): 2cdd7064b290132617248dbfd85f740e: so then I'll have to create it all by hand then?
6fb9253e45b0c2b1cd926321bf8acd28 (20:16): 2cdd7064b290132617248dbfd85f740e- i wanna make a "carousle" marquee
6fb9253e45b0c2b1cd926321bf8acd28 (20:17): so i won't have empty spaces on the marquee
6fb9253e45b0c2b1cd926321bf8acd28 (20:17): do you get me?
6fb9253e45b0c2b1cd926321bf8acd28 (20:18): cause right now it's scrolling, then after the last moving i get empty space
2cdd7064b290132617248dbfd85f740e (20:18): 6fb9253e45b0c2b1cd926321bf8acd28: you cant do that with marquee
6fb9253e45b0c2b1cd926321bf8acd28 (20:18): and then it's starts again
2cdd7064b290132617248dbfd85f740e (20:18): use a carousel.
6fb9253e45b0c2b1cd926321bf8acd28 (20:18): how do i use carousel
6fb9253e45b0c2b1cd926321bf8acd28 (20:18): can you gimme any reference to work with please?
2cdd7064b290132617248dbfd85f740e (20:18): 6fb9253e45b0c2b1cd926321bf8acd28: I wrote this long time ago but I am sure there are better implementations out htere http://nimbu.in/weemarquee/
6fb9253e45b0c2b1cd926321bf8acd28 (20:19): wow thats awsome!
6fb9253e45b0c2b1cd926321bf8acd28 (20:20): thats extacly what i was looking for
6fb9253e45b0c2b1cd926321bf8acd28 (20:20): is it for free?
2cdd7064b290132617248dbfd85f740e (20:20): yeah use as you wish
6fb9253e45b0c2b1cd926321bf8acd28 (20:21): thats mate :)
